heading: Join next Developer Update Livestream!
content: Patch 2.3.0 and Season 9 are getting closer and closer! Join the next Developer Update Livestream on June 27th to get ready for the patch! Indeed, the 2.3.0 PTR ended a few days ago and while we are patiently waiting for the patch to hit live! Our next Developer Update Livestream begins on and gives a preview of Season 9: Sins of the Horadrim. Join members of the development team as they share details on what’s coming in our newest season. Tune in to learn more about thew new questline coming with the season, Horadric Spellcraft, Escalating Nightmares, and more. There will also be a Q&A segment at the end of the stream for players to field their questions directly to the team. Visit our official Diablo channels to watch live! Following the Developer Update Livestream’s conclusion, join us for our next Sanctuary Sitdown with Community Host, Nacho and our very own Aislyn Hall talking all things Diablo IV. They’ll be in the to answer your burning questions. After the Livestream, you can visit our Diablo YouTube or Twitch channels to catch the replay of the Livestream if you miss it. We hope you enjoy the Season of Belial's Return with the aid of our Season 8 compendium update. Our focus for the rest of Season 8 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
